file_content.text: It's not exactly a clean life, but it's better than Jiguuna.
I heard a loud noise from the station--you destroyed the valve, then.
Seems that way.
Money, please.
Of course. Here it is. Thank you for your help.
It exploded into a bouquet of pretty sparks!
What a sight it was.
Great. Here's your reward, as promised. Thank you!
Got anything bigger you need broken, blown up or otherwise destroyed?
No sweat.
Uh--no, no, not that I can think of. But, uh, thank you.
Ah, credits.
I have nothing more to say to you.
Goodbye.
Goodbye, and thanks again.
Get away from me! Why don't you go running back to that slimy old man?
Destroy that valve before the old man's monsters destroy us!
You--the old man sent you, didn't he? I can smell his foul chemicals from here.
And you are?
I lived in the village down the way, until that old man came along--
So what if the old man sent me? He owe you money or something?
Why do you care?
Explain yourself before you accuse me.
I don't like your tone.
Just taking a walk.
Sure you are.
Do you know what those chemicals do? They purify the water all right, but they also do disgusting things to the water beasts--mutating them and making them rampage.
They come out of the water twice the size and ten times as vicious, and they're wiping us out!
Maybe the old man didn't realize what his chemicals did.
Do you think the guy knows?
What? You think because he's dying, he's kind and innocent?
That's awful.
Wait--there was a senseless slaughter and I wasn't invited?
And I missed the fun?
Listen. This may seem like some kind of joke to you, but it's not.
The old man's crazy. He clearly doesn't care if we all die in his purification process.
If you wanna help, you should go to that station and smash the valves in back that release the chemicals, so no one can use that station ever again.
Won't smashing the valve only cause the river to become polluted again?
What about the pollution?
I'm sure we'd all prefer if the river was cleaner, but we're talking about murder here!
What's your village worth to you?
Pay me.
I can only offer you a few credits. We are not a wealthy village. But it'll be worth it to keep the monsters at bay.
Vandalism--sounds fun!
I like breaking things.
Please, will you help us?
I'm going to purify the river.
Better to clean the water.
Heartless murderers!
I'll destroy the valve.
Yes, I'll protect the people.
You're a lifesaver. It'll be good to have some peace for once.
I hope the monsters don't come back.
